website_summaries.verdict: Offers quality similar to some competing brands with an easy-to-use applicator, plus some quality complaints.
pros: Organic argan oil in a handy pump bottle that reduces spills and messes
Has earned praise by repeat customers for taming frizzy hair and making it look shiny
cons: Mixed opinions on the consistency – some say it's too thin, others gripe that it's oily
Packaging doesn't indicate if it's tested on animals

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I found VoilaVe again! I thought I'd have to spend the winter with a stranger.
customer_reviews.text: I was hooked on Josie Maran wanted nothing else, and then I spotted all the questions & reviews for VoilaVe comparing them & claiming it to be the same or better. Rather than go broke with JM's which I swore on for years, iI tred it and was thrilled as I knew I would be. Amazon's customers always speak the truth! It lasted quite long and I forgot the brand name and I lost the almost finished bottle. With so many brands, I was very upset until I finally traced my previous purchase. This is the one, and now I can't wait for my new bottle.
customer_reviews.author: lulublu22

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like gold. It is worth every penny! Makes my hair look shiny and feel so soft. Good after shampoo, before shampoo as an oil treatment mask. Good on fingernails, under eyes or just a bit all over my face before bedtime. LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff and don't plan to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good for humidity
customer_reviews.text: I have very frizzy unmanageable hair and I was able to go out in the Florida weather by using this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil at an AFFORDABLE Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful oil. I use the tiniest amount to smooth the outside of my hair - after I comb it out from washing - then I air dry without disturbing. I get shiny waves with very little frizz or flyaways. It’s wonderful. I use it on my body as well. I’m comforted by the fact that it is natural/organic. There is no nasty smell as I have had in some other brands. The pump works great and has not leaked in any way. I make sure to reorder before my bottle is empty. The product arrives in a timely manner and my friends are now purchasing this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.text: I've been using this everyday on my face and I can already see my skin looking better. I don't notice a smell to it at all. It's been about 5 days so far so we'll see how it looks after a couple of weeks. So glad I bought this and I highly recommend giving it a try. Update: So I've been using this everyday for at least a month and my face feels so soft. My skin looks healthier, even has a glow to it. If you're thinking about trying it and can't make up your mind, try it. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: but I use it on my skin and I LOVE it. This prevents acne and helps my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my hair. I had been using an argan oil in my hair every day but it was not organic, so when I saw the price of this one I decided to try it. Leaves my hair really greasy looking even when I use a small amount. I no longer use this one in my hair, but I use it on my skin and I LOVE it. This prevents acne and helps my skin maintain an even skin tone on my back, chest, and face.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered more bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough positive things about this product. I use it everywhere! I first noticed the change in my nails. I have never had nice nails. I now have to trim my nails!!! They have grown thick and look very nice. I use this on my face twice a day and have noticed a difference in some dry areas. Also, my eyelashes love this oil! I have also been applying to an old scar and the scar has started shrinking. I recommend this product to everyone who will listen!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Philhart

customer_reviews.title: As good as Josie Maran's argan oil
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Josie Maran argan oil for at least 3 years but only used it on my face due to the high cost. This bottle such a generous size and I can honestly say that I have paid $100 for that same amount of Josie Maran's product. It is just as rich and moisturizing and now feel that I can afford to use it on other parts of my body. It absorbs well into the skin and doesn't have any scent. I have applied it to my dry heels and it softened them up quickly. I would recommend this product to my friends and daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: This is scam, do not not buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Argan oil from other vendors for many years and they were always consistent with the distinct smell, color, thickness, and absorbency. This one is nothing like I have been using before.
customer_reviews.author: grzes

customer_reviews.text: This bottle of argan oil is clear and has no scent. For having used virgin argan oil for years, I expected an amber colored and lightly scented oil. It didn’t seem authentic so I requested a return. Very disappointed at this purchase as there were many positive reviews.

Is there a new supplier or has this particular bottle gone bad? Never had I had a bad experience with this product until now. Gross. Previous review: It feels great on my face and I have had much fewer blemishes and radiant skin tone. I've stopped using concealer and foundation after using this product for a few weeks. I love the smell, as it's very mild and love how long my skin stays hydrated, even while living in the 0% humidity desert.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mkva

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very oily, which means its okay as a night ointment, but not otherwise. I've used argan oil (this label and others) for over a year and can say that for me it hasn't make any change in wrinkles or skin texture. I have a sense that we're all expecting a sudden and miraculous answer to the skin issues that aging highlights, but I can say without fear of contradiction that a topical application is not the answer. I don't think argan oil is harmful nor do I think it's helpful, which is what I think of most products. I'll use it every few days until its gone and then not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin and curls!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever!!! I am 23 I always had dry but clear skin my whole life and at 20 I got hormonal acne really oily face huge pores all that. This didn't fix my skin but I'm using it every day and I no longer use soap on my face just this and water and my pores are so much better and happier skin. Lifesaver. Also it's great for curly hair, looks oily at first so I put it on my hair before bed, then I shower in the morning (I don't use shampoo) and my curls dry perfectly soft and smooth. The best!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail C.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading about the benefits of argan oil, and I'm glad I did. It seems to be high quality, and is very effective. I added it to my homemade conditioning facial serum, I use a drop of it at night on my lips instead of regular lip balm, and I've also massaged a few drops into my hair as an overnight deep conditioner. In all cases, I can see results - argan is definitely an impressive, deep-conditioning oil. I plan to also add it to my next batch of homemade body butter. Will definitely be buying again and highly recommend this product.

This leaves my naturally curly hair looking like it has mousse in it for days even after washing. I have dry hair so its nice to have the silkiness to it and it does not smell like anything. Just a few tiny pumps on my hands rub it through my hair when wet or dry , and go ! Seems expensive but not really because the bottle will last a very good amount of time and it does everything you need it for and you do not have to apply every single day.

I did not bother to send it back since I had opened it. As far as mosturizing goes, it was okay but I did notice the pores on my face were more visible and larger. Once I went to a different moisturizing product, my pores were much less visible.

I also use their hair spray and mousse as well. I haven't tried this skin oil yet but am sure it will work well on my 76 year old skin. Can't hurt! Maybe I'll look 70!

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work Miracles
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I wanted to use this product to make my hair unbelievably shiny. However, there was no noticeable difference after using it. Instead, I started mixing the oil with my lotion and saw a difference after using it on my legs. My legs were always ashy from dry skin but using the oil/lotion mixture helped my legs look healthy throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every day for a few weeks, so I knew my review would be fair. As a moisturizer, it didn't blow me away. I have always had dry patches on my chin, and this didn't help it go away, but it didn't make it worse either. As a hair serum, I loved it. I put it on my ends when I got out of the shower, and it has gradually made brushing, straightening, and washing easier. Almost like it sealed down the hair to be more smooth. Even when I didn't use it, my hair seemed so smooth! As far as smells go, I didn't smell much of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to this oil. I use this oil every day on my face at night and before applying my makeup. The oil absorbs quickly. I think it has improved my skin and out of no where I am now getting compliments that I am looking younger. That is the best compliment this 62 year old women can get! Seriously I do see a change and like the product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about the product. For me it is moisturizing and practically odorless. The price is great, I've seen argan oil that costs much more. I also like the pump top as opposed to the dropper top. The size of the bottle is also a plus. I have already purchased this item more than once. It is part of my daily skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: anhuiscape

customer_reviews.title: Great for very dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to everything, so the great news is that I did not have a reaction to this Argan Oil. I had never used any argan oil before, so I found the liquid a little greasy (it is an oil, after all) but not as greasy as baby oil. It absorbed quiickly, and this morning the skin where I rubbed in the oil is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Zahrowski

customer_reviews.title: Good for nails and scarring
customer_reviews.text: This argan oil seems to absorb into my skin rather easily...I’m especially working on my nails and the place on my arm where a skin cancer was recently removed. I’m hoping this oil can keep the place from scarring so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this oil.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this oil... I received it in two days, I have bought other products just like this and when I looked at the ingredients they had so many, but not this one, nothing but the oil. Using it for my hair, skin, and even on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is eating this stuff up. I've been using it in oil treatments overnight mostly, but I also have used it as a sealant before gel, and a refresher. In the end, it works so well in the overnight treatments that I've decided to conserve it for only that to stretch it for as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I am 72 years old and recently my hair has gotten dry and fly away. After I wash my hair I let it air dry...no blow dryer. Then I pump two pumps of oil in the palm of my hands and rub them together and apply it to my hair, mostly up front and sides and ends. Then I use a fine tooth comb to comb it in. This really makes it shine and moist. I even have less itchy scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Josie Maran lovers - this is quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a different argan oil than Josie Maran's. I have sensitive skin and am very sensitive to fragrance. I love Josie Maran's. After reading many reviews for different argan oils here on Amazon, I decided on this one. This oil is the same consistency, color (none) as well as very faint to no fragrance. You can't tell the difference.

customer_reviews.title: ITS BABY OIL!!!

customer_reviews.author: Mother Goose

customer_reviews.title: I love this argan oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this organic argan oil everyday. I use it in my hair, face and body. You can use it everywhere. This is very natural because it is only one ingredient and organic. It is also very reasonably priced. I have ordered this 7 times and I will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two different argan oils - just to try them out. First one was so expensive and could not tell the difference on my face. The second one ordered had such an awful order, that I couldn't bring myself to apply. It made me nauseous. I am sticking to your product. It is does what it claims. I love my skin.

customer_reviews.title: I have used cheap versions of argan oil and had horrible results for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality argan oil. I have used cheap versions of argan oil and had horrible results for my hair. I definitely recommend others who are looking to purchase VoiaVe argan oil to buy it from Emagine Products. I even received my oil on time and it was packaged well. I did not have to contact the seller at all because I did not have any issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Okitawah

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and greasy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but this oil is very heavy. I consider myself to have "normal" skin. I have been using it on my face during the daytime before I apply my tinted moisturizer and on my hair after my shower. My skin feels basically greasy. After applying to my wet hair (I only use about a little less than a dime size amount), my hair feels oily and weighed down. It could just be the bottle that I got, not sure, but I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Many uses for this oil
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this oil. It's high quality and has improved the health and texture of my hair. It also works great to help manage frizz and flyaways. I've also used it in place of lotion when my skin is particularly dry. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Best-Kept Secret!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use this on my face and see what the results were. I couldn't be more pleased. My skin looks more youthful and I have been receiving compliments galore! I have spent a lot of money on various skin rejuvenation serums and moisturizers, with no discernible results. I urge you to try this and use it on your face under your makeup and at night after cleansing your skin. It is excellent for an all-over body moisturizer and as a conditioner for dry hair before shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: There was no scent which begs me to question the validity and or water percentage of the product being a natural oil, it should be fragrant either artificially or naturally at minimum. The consistency isn’t like my other Argan oil, which is the brand I actually intended to purchased because the logo and branding is nearly identical. The oil just sits on top not really penetrating or being absorbed or moisturizing the hair either. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to try to mislead you about how much true Argan Oil is in it and it works.
customer_reviews.text: Most of these products “with Argan Oil” have very little Argan Oil, but they say this to mislead you. They are overpriced too. I don’t care what kind of oil it is if it works. I do care if someone is using trickery to sell there product. I believe this is supposed to be real Argan Oil, but strangely enough, there is no list of ingredients on the bottle! I have been very happy with the product.

customer_reviews.title: A Moroccan Dream
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 4 months now and I cannot believe the difference in my skin. I use it on my entire body and my skin is soft, supple, lines on my face are reduced and I feel like my skin is glowing! I love this product and have recommended it to several of my friends! I might sound like a paid advertiser, but I swear by this product! It is incredible! You know it's good when you touch your skin and can't believe how smooth and supple it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Lenz

customer_reviews.title: For skin this stuff is great! For my hair it made it way too ...
customer_reviews.text: For skin this stuff is great! For my hair it made it way too oily. I am Caucasian with curly, thick hair. My hair is dry and usually drinks whatever I put on it but this stuff was too much. I would recommend blending it with a cream to lighten it up if you are wanting to use it for styling. If you are just looking for a deep hydrating mask for your hair then this stuff would work great for that. Really good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a MUST have product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It did wonders for my dry, color treated hair. I got compliments, immediately, from my hair dresser. ;-) I also made a facial skin toner with it and green tea. My skin looks wonderful! Where has this product been all my life! I yeah, and I used it on my cuticles, lol! Definitely a MUST have product!
customer_reviews.author: j maldonado

customer_reviews.title: I love the USDA Organic Moroccan Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the USDA Organic Moroccan Argan Oil. But, what makes this one different and better is the container! This containers pump top makes all the difference in the world. The top is FLAT and that makes a BIG, BIG difference. I have used other bottles with smooth, rounded pump tops and they are horrible because once you get oil on your hands you cannot control the pump. THOSE PUMPS ARE SO VERY ANNOYING!!! This bottle pump wins hands down!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too impressed with the Virgin Organic Argan Oil for Hair & Face! One reason is because it is hard to figure out just how much you need to use. My hair is long and I've used other oils that claim to have 100 percent Argan Oil in them, which went on smoothly, but after five years of using one specific product I felt it was time to change. Second reason is that this oil is extremely heavy. For those of us up in age, if you remember the VO5 days, that is what this reminds me of.
customer_reviews.author: DDiva

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my beard - makes it soft.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time beard grower - and most of the stuff you can buy to put into your beard for moisturizing contains Argan oil. I googled Argan since I didn't know anything about it, this is totally natural which is what I wanted. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Salsa Dude

customer_reviews.title: PURE ARGAN OIL! read the back of others
customer_reviews.text: beware of products that say Argan Oil in low end stores like target & walmart. READ THE INGREDIENTS ON THE BACK! THIS IS PURE ARGn oil. an awesome price & a great product. yes i use it in my hair because i use a lot of acid in my work cleaning coils. without this Argan Oil and some good shampoo; my hair is dry & brittle. my beautiful chocolate princess uses it in her hair also! check it out
customer_reviews.author: Twin Rivers AC & Refrigeration inc. in fort lauderdale

customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use this oil in my hair, face, and body. It absorbs quickly and leaves skin so soft and smooth. Works great as a frizz reducer for my hair. customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! I use half a pump in the ...

Try it out. I am so thankful I tried this!

Thank you for making this available. All of my friends are ordering it now. And I now have a monthly subscription so that I always have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: James Reed "Dharman"

customer_reviews.title: Argan oil is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was a lightning deal that I couldn't resist. Price was great and I always use Prime shipping, so the delivery was right on time. I've used another brand of argan oil, but bought this to use next, so I confess, I haven't used it yet. However, argan oil has proven to be THE best thing for my hair and skin. I used coconut oil for a while, then an organic oil blend, but after switching to argan oil, I'll never go back. Try it, if you haven't. You'll love it. Just a few drops needed and it absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I finally feel like I have a ...
customer_reviews.text: FInally, my hair is soft and shiny! I color my curly hair and it has always been dry and frizzy. I thought I'd give this a go after speaking with friends and WOW! It took me some time to figure out how to use this. After washing my hair, I put two drops in my hands and massage Argan Oil into my hair. On days where I don't wash my hair, I'll add a drop into my hands and do the same. Awesome product! I finally feel like I have a beautiful head of hair!
customer_reviews.author: Anrol N

customer_reviews.title: Best skin care ever
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful light oil, absorbs easily; argan oil has been my only skin care for about a year and I am thrilled. This brand is right up there in value and quality. I like that it has a pump, as droppers are impossible to keep screwed on tightly. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny's mom

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your hair oily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instead of Moroccan oil brand since it is so expensive. The product works well but you can't really use it as a leave in on Clean hair.. Leaves your hair very oily looking even if you only use a little bit so i am slightly disappointed. I will start using it on my hair at night and wash it out in the morning.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff

Will continue to purchase. Definitely a good buy.

customer_reviews.title: My hair is so healthy now!!

Have even received comments on how smooth and soft my face is. Use it in other parts of my body too, just not as often as my face.

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I use it on my face and I mix it with other oils for an all natural moisturizing body oil. Just remember to apply daily even after the psoriasis is gone for another week. Helps nails and hair to grow as well! DO NOT INGEST!!!

Although this product is not as thick, it works just as well as other argan oil products. Smooths my hair and leaves it shiny. A little goes a long way. I am also using this on my face.
